author: Jamie Stephenson
description: Amber and red layer easily in this fruity drink.
name: Victoria's Secret
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Bottlegreen Cox's Apple and Plum Cordial
30 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
SHAKE other ingredients with ice and carefully strain into glass so this second layer floats on first
